abstract: Palm, creator of the Pre smartphone, is seeking bids for the company as early as this week, three people familiar with the situation told Bloomberg News.
snippet: Palm, creator of the Pre smartphone, is seeking bids for the company as early as this week, three people familiar with the situation told Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: 6:18 p.m. | Updated The New York Times’s Miguel Helft provides more details of Palm’s efforts to sell itself.

headline.main: Palm Is Said to Be Seeking a Buyer
